Paid Ads Management

Paid Ads Management

Manage the full cycle of paid ad campaigns directly from Semrush. Streamline processes and scale your results, whether launching your first campaign or optimizing existing ones

Explore Now
Ads Launch Assistant

Set up Google Ads campaigns easily with an advanced AI ad generator and Semrush data, getting high-quality suggestions at every step of the ad management process.
